text: Kozhippalam is a village in Pathanamthitta District, Kerala, India. ==Language== Malayalam is the native language of Kozhippalam. ==Politics== Kozhippalam is a part of Pathanamthitta Loksabha constituency. Mr. Anto Antony is the current Member of Parliament of the constituency. ==Weather== The climate of the place is moderate and pleasant. Tropical climate is prevailed here throughout the year. ==Transportation== The major transportation service of this place is provided by Kerala State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC). ==References== Category:Villages in Pathanamthitta district
title: Kozhippalam
